resources.string: P~P wants to send you information

Ask one of the P~P employees to validate the promotion

Welcome to the Promotions ~ Places Terms and Conditions of Use based on P~P services. These constitute a binding agreement between any natural or legal person (hereinafter and without distinction, the "User" or the "Users") who download, use or interact with the Application and / or request any service available through the Application.

If you do not agree with these, do not download the Application on your device, do not use it, or interact with the Services. The User guarantees to have the minimum age necessary to use and request the Services, which will be linked to the minimum age required.

On the other hand, the Notifications consist in that the User can receive notifications about the P~P advertising, receive coupons, discounts and offers, as long as they have a Bluetooth® system enabled and have granted permission for the Application to use it.
